name: An event that repeats every year
_comment: This field is ignored so feel free to leave comments here

name: An event that repeats every month
_comment: Valid values for repeat are 'year', 'month', 'week', 'day', 'hour', and 'minute'

name: An event that only happens once
_comment: Start time can be any ISO8601 timestamp or date-ish string

name: An event with a custom display format
displayFormat: dddd, MMMM Do, YYYY, h:mm a
_comment: This event overrides the default date display, and defines its own. Format strings are anything supported by moment.js

name: An old event that still gets displayed
_comment: By default, one-time events are hidden after one day. 'hideAfter' is used to change this.
